import React, {Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class SelectPage extends Component{ constructor(props) { super(); this.state = { city: "", state: "", latitude: "", longitude: "", zipcode: "", streetAddress: "", }; this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this); } componentDidMount(){ const params = new URLSearchParams(this.props.location.search); this.setState({ state: params.get("state"), city: params.get("city"), zipcode: params.get("zipcode"), streetAddress: params.get("streetAddress"), }) } handleClick(string) { window.location = "/facility?facility="+string+"&state="+this.state.state+"&city="+this.state.city+"&streetAddress="+this.state.streetAddress+"&zipcode="+this.state.zipcode } styleObj = { fontSize: 14, color: "#000000", fontWeight: 100, textAlign: "center", backgroundColor: "#FFFFFF", margin: 10, } styleObj2 = { fontSize: 14, color: "#000000", fontWeight: 100, textAlign: "center", backgroundColor: "#FFFFFF", margin: 2, } render(){ return(

#category!

{this.state.streetAddress} {this.state.city} {this.state.state} {this.state.zipcode}
facilities

Hospitals

Pharmacies

Emergency Medical Services Stations

Urgent Care Facilities

Veterans Health Administrations

National Shelter Systems Facilities

Local Emergency Operations

Fire Stations

) } } export default SelectPage
